property.value:
Run this mod ONCE to retrieve any lost skillpoints.

[AF1E19]*[-] Calculate the missing points! (Your level * 1, -1 first level, +4 starter quest.)
[AF1E19]*[-] Change the value for the reward type entry in the quests.xml file.
[AF1E19]*[-] Restart your save to update!
[AF1E19]*[-] Complete the quest!

You now have your lost skillpoints back. Enjoy!

-Sirillion
